description: Tell Me Something Dirty:  Two hard, hot, beautifully proportioned bodies on a black leather sheet - what better way to get your attention or to begin a great film.  So delicately balanced are these studs, the action flows undisturbed.  The action ended only when the film ran out.  They were and are in control of their bodies from beginning to end.  Strangers when they met - they left the film knowing each other as two men have never known each other before.  They are masters of sexual techniques, and their capacity for endurance is unequaled in any previous film of this type.  Steve and Mike are two names that will come to mind when you think of sucking, fucking, rimming, dildoes, toe sucking and fist-fucking.  Forget any other film you've seen and enjoyed - one look at this and all other films will become obsolete.
title: Something Dirty, Scene #01
